item.title: Central Penn College
item.description: Central Penn College is a career-oriented, baccalaureate and post-baccalaureate, residential college in the suburbs of Harrisburg and an offsite location in Lancaster Pennsylvania. Central Penn offers bachelor's and associate degree programs for both traditional and continuing education students by providing hands-on and online distance education taught by experienced, caring faculty.
